value.title: Enable reliable messaging for Big Data applications using Azure Event Hubs
value.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Event Hubs to reliably process high-volume data streams to enable you to code applications to send and receive messages through the hub.

value.title: Use data types and structs, arrays, slices, and maps in Go
value.excerpt: Learn about structs, arrays, slices, and maps. Understand the difference between them and when to use one type over the other.

value.title: Implement message-based communication workflows with Azure Service Bus
value.excerpt: Discover how to write code in .NET applications using Azure Service Bus for communications that can handle high demand, low bandwidth, and hardware failures.

value.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the services available on Azure for your high-performance computing workloads.

value.title: Introduction to Git
value.excerpt: Use Git to track changes and collaborate with other developers

value.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
value.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Learn about using an Azure API gateway to share APIs with partners, and how to use subscription keys to control access to your APIs.

value.title: Use watchlists in Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Use watchlists in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Azure API for FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Michael Hansen joins Scott Hanselman to explain what FHIR is and how to get started with FHIR on Azure. Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (or, FHIR) is a new standard for representing and exchanging healthcare data. Developed by the HL7 community to address problems with interoperability, pieces
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5vS7Iq9vpXE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.

value.title: Go serverless: Big data processing with Azure Event Hubs for Apache Kafka | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Working with Apache Kafka and want to simplify management of your infrastructure? value.excerpt: Anavi Nahar joins Donovan Brown to show how virtual network peering enables you to connect networks seamlessly in Azure Virtual Network. value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Stream Analytics streaming data, the concepts of event processing, and integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.
